content: get ready to welcome spring with the **wheat stitch™ easter bunny basket** this charming new pattern features the beautifully textured 4-row repeat wheat stitch™ 1 making it both simple and fun to create we ll start by crafting a sturdy basket bottom in the round then we ll make the basket body in row with a fold-over edge for added stability we ll end by adding the cutest finishing touches adorable bunny ears a fluffy tail and a sturdy handle whether you go for soft pastels bold brights or classic neutrals this basket will look amazing in any color perfect for all ages it s a delightful way to add handmade charm to easter celebrations we ll begin this easter basket by crocheting the bottom first and setting it aside next we ll create the body piece which folds over to form a double layer perfect for added structure after that we ll crochet the ears handle and bunny tail if you d like to reinforce your basket we ll do that just before adding the finishing touches during assembly a video tutorial is included with the pattern 2 crochet hook j 6 0mm - or size to meet gauge 3 notions removable stitch markers 5 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 large pompom maker 7 16 gauge copper wire 8 round nose pliers/wire cutters 9 optional plastic canvas 10 optional sewing clips 11 optional wooden circles for a flat sturdy bottom 10 inch 12 yarn lion brand hue & me 13 80% acrylic 20% wool 137yds/125g or mary maxim titan 14 100% acrylic 80yds/85g weight 5 bulky yardage 360 yds main color 3 skeins 70 yds accent color 1 skein yardage based off lion brand hue & me yarn substitutions may change yardage yarn substitutions lion brand thick & quick 15 80% acrylic 20% wool 106yds/170g wecrochet brava bulky 16 100% premium acrylic 136yds/100g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain s - chain s double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 17 ws - wrong side gauge 12 sts and 10 row = 4 by 4 in stitch pattern repeat row 3-6 not blocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 18 sizes one size skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 19 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 20 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 21 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 22 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 23 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 24 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this
